properties.title: Artemis Limnatios? (Messenia)
properties.summary: Unlocated archaic to Roman sanctuary on Messenia/Lakonia border, possibly Proph. Ilias church NE of Vorio Gaitson or further NE

properties.title: Artemis Limnatis sanct. (Messenia)
properties.summary: contested border sanctuary by chapel of Panagia Kapsocherovolousa, Volimos, Messenia
